      • sendAnswers

        @RequestMapping(value="/sendAnswers",
                produces="text/html;chearset=UTF-8",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String sendAnswers(@RequestParam(value="userCode",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String userCode,
                                                                                                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Method is used to parse and process received answers

        It does: 1. builds and ArrayList of answers 2. sends answers to the QuestionManager 3. receives score result from QuestionManager 4. displays result to the student
